title: Elizabeth Hardwick’s Master Class on Literature and Life
description: In his elegiac memoir, “Come Back in September,” the novelist and critic Darryl Pinckney recalls his former writing teacher and lifelong friend, and the vibrant New York intellectual world they once inhabited.
dc:creator: Maggie Doherty
media:description: Elizabeth Hardwick at her writing desk in her apartment on West 67th Street in Manhattan in 1974. She told her students that the only reasons to write were “desperation or revenge.”
